title: Can I have this reviewed thank you
body:
Would like to see it revoked as the 1st game there's nothing that should warrant any trouble and the second game you can see I kept my cool most the game right up until the end when we had 2 trolls on team and I'm willing to bet they are still playing the game whilst I'm being banned over what is little to nothing!

Game 1
iSupport Bot: bruh
iSupport Bot: sivir just turn onto him in that situation
iSupport Bot: he singled himself out
iSupport Bot: and they already blew move
iSupport Bot: they're gonna try push hard bot by the looks
iSupport Bot: mmm bby
iSupport Bot: ty
iSupport Bot: back or nah?
iSupport Bot: ty
iSupport Bot: i got shields
iSupport Bot: I honestly thought you wouldn't go through lane we had an easy kill on wwe then
iSupport Bot: why you body block me
iSupport Bot: legit
iSupport Bot: legitness
iSupport Bot: you stood there and blocked me
iSupport Bot: so frustrating
iSupport Bot: fml like I'm ready to not bother helping your ass anymore after that one
iSupport Bot: ww
iSupport Bot: theres other lanes
iSupport Bot: I got body blocked actually
iSupport Bot: by you
iSupport Bot: I coulda gotten away
iSupport Bot: so are you
iSupport Bot: might wanna gank bot when they are constantly pushed
iSupport Bot: nasus is fine
iSupport Bot: and fizz is roam
iSupport Bot: sivir?
iSupport Bot: and you call me bronze
iSupport Bot: legit throw one or two autos there was a free kill
iSupport Bot: what are you doing
iSupport Bot: sivir doesn't do anything at all tbh
iSupport Bot: she even has fkn thunderlords
iSupport Bot: nah sivir is just useless
iSupport Bot: im overit
iSupport Bot: k not like you're afk farm the whole time anyway
iSupport Bot: thought she did
iSupport Bot: we got afk and some kind of adc too?
iSupport Bot: seriously ff so I can have an adc who knows what they doing
iSupport Bot: haven't even sworn or nothing so w/e
iSupport Bot: you picked jungle twitch thats trolol
iSupport Bot: i should report you
iSupport Bot: same logic idiot
iSupport Bot: I dont play twitch
iSupport Bot: but congrats no one cares
iSupport Bot: yall suck
iSupport Bot: and say I do cute
iSupport Bot: k
iSupport Bot: thats great
iSupport Bot: couldn't stop the spike
iSupport Bot: k
iSupport Bot: like reallyt
iSupport Bot: dude
iSupport Bot: honestly
iSupport Bot: you that jacked up on mountain dew
iSupport Bot: so nice of you to join us
iSupport Bot: what a waste
iSupport Bot: its cus twitch decided to ult one person and sivir or fizz weren't even there until end
Game 2
iSupport Bot: kewl...
iSupport Bot: red side orrn
iSupport Bot: ^^^
iSupport Bot: red
iSupport Bot: indeed
iSupport Bot: draven rkan is my fav
iSupport Bot: LOL zed
iSupport Bot: waht
iSupport Bot: lets be honest that shoulda got him
iSupport Bot: it was like 0.001 sec out
iSupport Bot: oh well once you're a monster it doesn't matter anymore
iSupport Bot: what is this orrn doing
iSupport Bot: legit hasn't ganked once
iSupport Bot: or anywhere else
iSupport Bot: 0/0/0
iSupport Bot: bro do some work
iSupport Bot: do something
iSupport Bot: do anything
iSupport Bot: omg you DIOD SOMETHING
iSupport Bot: I'm slow clapping for you rn
iSupport Bot: fair enuf
iSupport Bot: waht
iSupport Bot: are you feeling alright zed?
iSupport Bot: \this orrn tho
iSupport Bot: um assist team?
iSupport Bot: ya know
iSupport Bot: casual stuff
iSupport Bot: nah m8
iSupport Bot: too predictable
iSupport Bot: plz report orrn for trolling

iSupport Bot: stood there and spammed whilst team was fighting
iSupport Bot: thats just then
iSupport Bot: plenty more bs all match from you
iSupport Bot: you're refusing to help me and draven for no reason when its a team game
iSupport Bot: grow up or uninstall
iSupport Bot: lol
iSupport Bot: lol ah

iSupport Bot: wtf is this fiesta

iSupport Bot: useless perhaps?
iSupport Bot: because it was a free kill
iSupport Bot: until you fucking ran off for no reason
iSupport Bot: and we were near our 2nd tier tower in lane
iSupport Bot: there were 2 at their broken inhib
iSupport Bot: and one bot
iSupport Bot: so do the math stupid
iSupport Bot: bronze afg

Your player review system is completely ridiculous at this point RIOT as you can see people are being banned over the slightest incidents whilst trolls and purpose feeders go unpunished, really who is ruining the game here?
